title: "Tech start-ups begin to leave Hong Kong because of new security law"
excerpt: "China's sweeping national security law has forced technology firms to reconsider their presence in Hong Kong. The nimblest among them -- the city's startups - are already moving data and people out or are devising plans to do so."
